android-cloexec-fopen.description:
Description

fopen()
should include
e
in their mode string; so
re
would be
valid. This is equivalent to having set
FD_CLOEXEC
on
that descriptor.

Examples:

fopen
(
"fn"
,
"r"
);
// becomes
fopen
(
"fn"
,
"re"
);
android-cloexec-fopen.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
